name: CricketSounds
0:
”Alexa open Cricket Sounds”
”Alexa ask Cricket Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cricket sounds
des:
Cricket Sounds brings the serene and rhythmic chirping of crickets to your space, simulating a warm summer night no matter the season. It's excellent for those who find comfort in the sounds of nature, aiding in relaxation and sleep by providing a natural, calming background.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Cricket Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
